name: Relic
Active Effect: Relics provide special powers available to all gods. Your first Relic is free at Level 1 and your Second Relic is unlocked once you reach Level 12.

name: Shard Relic
Active Effect: Shard Relics provide special powers available to all gods. Shard Relics are free and can be upgraded to a new Relic once you reach Level 12.

name: Golden Shard
Passive Effect: PASSIVE - All Basic Attacks will also hit enemies within a 10 unit radius of the target for 15% of the damage to Gods and 15% of the damage to Minions and Jungle Camps. Shard Relics can be upgraded to a new Relic once you reach Level 12.

name: Horn Shard
Active Effect: Your non-ultimate ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5s every 0.5s for the next 3s. Shard Relics can be upgraded to a new Relic once you reach Level 12. Cooldown - 120s.

name: Sturdy Shard
Passive Effect: PASSIVE - Being hit by a hard Crowd Control creates a pulse that provides 5 + 1 per level Protections to yourself and allies within 55 units for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 20s. Shard Relics can be upgraded to a new Relic once you reach Level 12.

name: Vibrant Shard
Passive Effect: PASSIVE - Every 100 units traveled, you gain a buff that deals 10 (+20%/15% of your Physical/Magical Power) Physical Damage to the next enemy hit with your next Basic Attack or ability. Shard Relics can be upgraded to a new Relic once you reach Level 12.

name: Vision Shard
Active Effect: Using this item places a ward that lasts 90 seconds. Shard Relics can be upgraded to a new Relic once you reach Level 12. Cooldown - 90s.

name: Wing Shard
Active Effect: Your Movement Speed is increased by 15% and your Attack Speed is increased by 40% for the next 5s. Shard Relics can be upgraded to a new Relic once you reach Level 12. Cooldown - 90s.

name: Aegis Amulet
Active Effect: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Cooldown - 170s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Blink Rune
Active Effect: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 45 units away instantly. This item can not be used if you have taken or dealt damage in the last 3s. Cooldown - 140s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Bracer of Radiance
Active Effect: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this glow gain 10% increased Power if above half health or 10% Movement Speed if below Half Health for 8s. This fragment acts as a ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 120s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Bracer of Radiance
Active Effect: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this glow gain 10% increased Power if above half health or 10% Movement Speed if below Half Health for 8s. This fragment acts as a ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 120s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Cloak of Meditation
Active Effect: Using this item causes you to enter a meditative state where nearby allied gods within 35 units restore 10 + 2.5% of their missing health and 10 + 3% of missing mana each tick. Heals occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 150s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Divine Barrier
Active Effect: Deploy a 40 unit wide wall of divine light that reduces the damage of all enemy Basic Attacks that pass through it by 30%. Additionally, all allies that pass through the barrier have their Movement Speed increased by 5% for 3s while enemies that pass through the barrier are Slowed by 30% for 3s. The barrier lasts for 30s. Cooldown - 100s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Heavenly Wings
Active Effect: Using this item grants allied gods within 55 units 20% increased Movement Speed, 10% increased Attack Speed, and Slow immunity for 5s. Cooldown - 120sKill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Heavenly Wings
Active Effect: Using this item grants allied gods within 55 units 20% increased Movement Speed, 10% increased Attack Speed, and Slow immunity for 5s. Cooldown - 120sKill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Horrific Emblem
Active Effect: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 25% and decreases their Damage Dealt by 10% for 4s. Additionally, all Healing received by enemy gods is reduced by 40% and their shield effectiveness is decreased by 50%. Cooldown - 140s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Magic Shell
Active Effect: Using this item applies a shield to yourself and allies within 35 units for 100 Health + 12 Health per God Level for 3 seconds. Additionally, all allies take 20% reduced damage from Basic Attacks while the shield is active. Cooldown - 150s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Purification Beads
Active Effect: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. Cooldown - 170s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Shield of Thorns
Active Effect: Using this item grants you 15% Damage Mitigation as you store all damage taken over the next 3s. You then explode in a 30 unit radius, dealing 85 + 50% of the damage taken as Magical Damage, up to a maximum of 25% of an enemy’s Max Health. While this is active, enemies can only lifesteal from you for 75% of their total lifesteal. Cooldown - 140s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Shield of Thorns
Active Effect: Using this item grants you 15% Damage Mitigation as you store all damage taken over the next 3s. You then explode in a 30 unit radius, dealing 85 + 50% of the damage taken as Magical Damage, up to a maximum of 25% of an enemy’s Max Health. While this is active, enemies can only lifesteal from you for 75% of their total lifesteal. Cooldown - 140s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Sundering Spear
Active Effect: Fire a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on first god hit dealing 5% of their Current Health as True Damage and reducing any active shields by 75%. Targets hit take 5% increased damage for 5s. This relic has 2 charges. Cooldown - 130s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Sundering Spear
Active Effect: Fire a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on first god hit dealing 5% of their Current Health as True Damage and reducing any active shields by 75%. Targets hit take 5% increased damage for 5s. This relic has 2 charges. Cooldown - 130s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Teleport Fragment
Active Effect: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied structure while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Cooldown - 220s.Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

name: Greater Aegis Amulet
Active Effect: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Cooldown - 140s.Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

name: Aegis of Acceleration
Active Effect: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Each instance of damage prevented in this time provides you 7% Movement Speed for 4s, stacking up to 3 times. Cooldown - 140s.

name: Blessed Barrier
Active Effect: Deploy a 40 unit wide wall of divine light that reduces the damage of all enemy Basic Attacks that pass through it by 30% and increases the damage of all allied Basic Attacks by 20%. Additionally, all allies that pass through the barrier have their Movement Speed increased by 5% for 3s while enemies that pass through the barrier are Slowed by 30% for 3s. The barrier lasts for 30s. Cooldown - 80s.

name: Bracer of Brilliance
Active Effect: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this field gain 10% increased Power and 15% Movement Speed for 8s. This fragment acts as a Sentry Ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 100s.

name: Bracer of Brilliance
Active Effect: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this field gain 10% increased Power and 15% Movement Speed for 8s. This fragment acts as a Sentry Ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 100s.

name: Cloak of the Ascetic
Active Effect: Using this item causes you to Enter a meditative state where nearby allied gods within 35 units restore 25 + 3.5% of their missing health and 30 + 4% of missing mana each pulse. Additionally each pulse reduces cooldowns for all abilities by 1.5s. Pulses occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 130s.

name: Cloak of the Ascetic
Active Effect: Using this item causes you to Enter a meditative state where nearby allied gods within 35 units restore 25 + 3.5% of their missing health and 30 + 4% of missing mana each pulse. Additionally each pulse reduces cooldowns for all abilities by 1.5s. Pulses occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 130s.

name: Emblem of Increasing Peril
Active Effect: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 25% and decreases their Damage Dealt by 10% for 4s. Additionally, all Healing received by enemy gods is reduced by 40% and their shield effectiveness is decreased by 50%. If an enemy deals 10% of an Allied God's Maximum Health within the duration, the Movement Speed and Damage Dealt decreases are increased by 5% each, stacking up to 3 times. Cooldown - 120s.

name: Emblem of Increasing Peril
Active Effect: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 25% and decreases their Damage Dealt by 10% for 4s. Additionally, all Healing received by enemy gods is reduced by 40% and their shield effectiveness is decreased by 50%. If an enemy deals 10% of an Allied God's Maximum Health within the duration, the Movement Speed and Damage Dealt decreases are increased by 5% each, stacking up to 3 times. Cooldown - 120s.

name: Entangling Wings
Active Effect: Using this item grants allies within 55 units 25% increased Movement Speed, 25% increased Attack Speed, and Slow immunity for 5s. On use, this Relic also Roots enemies in the area for 1s. Cooldown - 100s

name: Entangling Wings
Active Effect: Using this item grants allies within 55 units 25% increased Movement Speed, 25% increased Attack Speed, and Slow immunity for 5s. On use, this Relic also Roots enemies in the area for 1s. Cooldown - 100s

name: Persistent Teleport
Active Effect: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied structure or ward while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Kills and assists on enemy gods reduces the cooldown by 10s. After teleporting you gain Slow immunity, 20% Movement Speed, and 40 Protections for 5s. Cooldown - 110s.

name: Phantom Shell
Active Effect: Using this item applies a shield to yourself and allies within 35 units for 150 Health + 15 Health per God Level for 4 seconds. Additionally, all allies take 40% reduced damage from Basic Attacks while the shield is active. Using this item also allows you and allied gods to pass through players and player made objects. Cooldown - 130s.

name: Scorching Blink Rune
Active Effect: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 45 units away instantly, leaving behind a trail of wildfire that burns Enemies that pass through it for 20 (+ 4 per level) True Damage every 0.5s for the next 4s. Additionally, enemies hit have their Movement and Attack Speed Slowed by 15%. These effects persist for 1.5s after leaving the flames. This item can not be used if you have taken or dealt damage in the last 3s. Cooldown - 120s.

name: Sundering Blast
Active Effect: Fire a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first Enemy God hit and splashing in a 20 unit radius, dealing 7.5% of their Current Health as True Damage and reducing any active shields by 75%. Targets hit take 7.5% increased damage for 5s. This relic has 2 charges. Cooldown - 110s.

name: Sundering Blast
Active Effect: Fire a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first Enemy God hit and splashing in a 20 unit radius, dealing 7.5% of their Current Health as True Damage and reducing any active shields by 75%. Targets hit take 7.5% increased damage for 5s. This relic has 2 charges. Cooldown - 110s.

name: Temporal Beads
Active Effect: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. Additionally, your active cooldowns are reduced by 3s on use. Cooldown - 140s.

name: Thorns of Judgement
Active Effect: Using this item grants you 15% Damage Mitigation as you store all damage taken over the next 3s. You then explode in a 30 unit radius, dealing 85 + 50% of the damage taken as Magical Damage, up to a maximum of 25% of an enemy’s Max Health. While this is active, enemies can only lifesteal from you for 50% of their total lifesteal. Each basic attack from enemy gods reduces the cooldown of this item by 0.5s. Cooldown - 120s.

name: Thorns of Judgement
Active Effect: Using this item grants you 15% Damage Mitigation as you store all damage taken over the next 3s. You then explode in a 30 unit radius, dealing 85 + 50% of the damage taken as Magical Damage, up to a maximum of 25% of an enemy’s Max Health. While this is active, enemies can only lifesteal from you for 50% of their total lifesteal. Each basic attack from enemy gods reduces the cooldown of this item by 0.5s. Cooldown - 120s.
